DOC.detailed_description: The current standard care oocyte retrieval IVF involve fentanyl , propofol , well oxycodone . However , exist little data alternative narcotic medication analgesic purpose oocyte retrieval procedure . A retrospective study publish 2013 show potential NSAID 's , specifically ketorolac , significantly improve pain score woman undergo oocyte retrieval ( Mesen et al ) . It also show use medication significantly alter pregnancy rate , live birth rate , miscarriage rate patient . Few study delve question anesthetic oocyte retrieval except prospective study 2006 . This study , perform Akande et al , show significant difference pregnancy rate implantation occur use acetaminophen diclofenac vs. acetaminophen alone give post-operatively . However , pain measure study either group . Therefore , clear exists limit data subject analgesic use oocyte retrieval vitro fertilization exploration alternative medication require find effective least harmful option .
